ironingot.Name: Iron Ingot
ironingot.Description: Smelted from iron from the depths of the land. Prehaps you can forge items with this?

crimsontidepotion.Name: Healing Potion
crimsontidepotion.Description: A generic healing potion brewed likely by someone who shouldn't be brewing potions.

bloodthorn.Name: Blood Thorn
bloodthorn.Description: A rare reagent, a small stem covered in red thorns.

worm.Name: Worms
worm.Description: Little Critter that loves the rain, prehaps it would like swimming as well.

mistflower.Name: Mist Flower
mistflower.Description: Flower found on islands in the southen hemisphere.

artifact.Name: Unknown Relic
artifact.Description: The relic hums with mysical energy.

dungeon_first_key.Name: Dungeon Key (Namira Ruins)
dungeon_first_key.Description: Used to open locked doors, it will break on use.
